analysis.description:

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/24/0x98334013ce045b5b84448a5c28fe9000c76fe54b.sol:

	 - buy (/unique_chucks/24/0x98334013ce045b5b84448a5c28fe9000c76fe54b.sol#20-21)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
